possible_choices: AEs are used for supervised learning while VAEs are used for unsupervised learning.
VAEs enforce a uniform distribution in the latent space, while AEs do not.
VAEs permit sampling of new data by decoding standard Gaussian noise, while sampling from AEs is more difficult.
AEs have a loss function while VAEs do not.
choice_explanations: No, both are used for unsupervised learning.
No, VAEs enforce a standard Gaussian distribution in the latent space.
No, both have a loss function.
